segments.text: I am really worried about that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed out, making the whole thing unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, and he's still reaching with all his might.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he's going to tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet too, which would make any fall much worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really hurt himself on those hard kitchen tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate he's holding might shatter everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl looking up at him, oblivious to the immediate danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a terrifying moment, suspended in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is fraught with peril.
segments.speaker: PAR
